meanings.sent1: I will be preprinting the invitations for the party.
meanings.sent2: The company is preprinting the brochures for the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: She joked that preprinting the labels made her feel like a professional printer.
meanings.sent4: Preprinting the documents before the meeting saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained that preprinting the worksheets would help the students prepare better.

meanings.definition: The act of printing something in advance.
meanings.sent1: The preprinting of the newspapers ensured they would be ready for distribution.
meanings.sent2: We have a preprinting process in place to streamline our production.
meanings.sent3: The preprinting of the tickets made the event feel more official.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a preprinting machine, always planning ahead.
meanings.sent5: The preprinting of the labels made the packaging process much faster.
